ED_Title: Taking note of decision 74/544 entitled “Procedure for taking decisions of the General Assembly during the Coronavirus disease (COVID-19) pandemic”
ED_DecisionText: At its 62nd plenary meeting, on 3 September 2020, the General Assembly pursuant to its decision 74/544 of 27 March 2020, took note of decision 74/544 entitled “Procedure for taking decisions of the General Assembly during the Coronavirus disease (COVID-19) pandemic”.
ED_Disclaimer: The final version of decisions adopted during the resumed part of the session will be contained in the official record of the GA (A/74/49 (Vol. III)) after editorial review.
